1426580.name: Situation Normal
1426580.description:
Situation Normal is a fast, chaotic 2.5D action platformer where the player sets the pace.
Move slowly and infiltrate room by room — or rush in, fire wildly, and let the world collapse around you.
Guns kick, ceilings fall, debris reacts, and every shot adds to the chaos you create.

You play a secret agent dropped into a strange underground facility.
Fight through collapsing factory halls, malfunctioning machinery, and swarms of goons as you uncover the plans of the elusive Dr. Hibbles.

Movement and combat are tightly linked:

  • Dash by firing backwards — recoil becomes mobility

  • Switch weapons instantly and juggle limited special ammo

  • Use the environment — falling debris, breakable floors, unstable machinery

  • Instant respawns with quick room resets keep the action flowing

The tone mixes light-hearted humor, reactive environments, and tough platforming challenges.
Made by a father & son team who love tight controls, readable chaos, and games that push back just enough.
